title: LFT Silver+   ---- mid laner --- My rank=gold
body:
I am a really good Mid laner with good warding and team play but bad map awareness. I will often carry, I am quickly climbing through the ranks with a win rate of 56% and am looking to expand my knowledge of the game and how to win through playing a with a good 5's team. If you don't believe about my laning skills put me in a 1v1 against whoever you wish. Mostly trying to learn better at playing the Map and how to get others in my team fed aswell as myself. Any teams add me in-game.

IGN: Spontanious Burn
Rank:Gold V-IV promos
Peak Rank: Gold II Season 4
Skype: ill tell you in game
Curse: Available
Main champs: Got a very wide champion pool

replies.body: i'll be happy to duo, i'm silver 3 now and my peak is silver 1
